description: This walk explores the local woodlands and hills near the town of Clonmel in County Tipperary. The walk starts in the town and begins with a pleasant stroll along the River Suir before heading south west towards the forested area. There's miles of woodland trails here with a climb towards Killacomma Hill as well. To continue your walking in the area you can pick up the popular Suir Blueway in the town. This shared cycling and walking trail runs along the River Suir between Carrick-on-Suir and Clonmel. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Clonmel. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
